title: Manipulated Into Fear: There Is Always A Pattern
description: The main character, Marvela was an executive who was manipulated into the dark side of life. She painfully hid behind her smile. While writing her story and doing research, she discovered that her husband, Rolf was a psychopath and there was always a pattern. Marvela has a daughter, LaKina who meets a man, Hugo and he has the same patterns.The sequel, White Roses In A Dream, Marvela highlights her traits, patterns and action plans on how she sustained the relationship and the story continues.
author: Marvela Dawnay
